title: Kanrich Finance Nugegoda branch moves to new premises
body_lines: Kanrich Finance Limited opened its newly relocated Nugegoda branch at No 31, Stanley Thilakaratne Mawatha, Nugegoda. Kanrich Finance Limited has a history of 50 years and trusted excellence, backed by loyal customers who have been the source of its strengths. Kanrich Nugegoda branch serves the customers with an unmatched service to fulfill all the financial requirements. The management invites residents in Nugegoda to experience their unparalleled excellence in financial solutions.
